column2: Wet the finger and touch the "letter" on the candle.

column2: Sweep the floor after dark, you'll see sickness before morning.
column3: Sweep the floor after dark, you'll see sickness before morning.

column2: If, when a newly-married couple go to housekeeping, she slyly takes her mother's dish-cloth or dish-wiper, she will never be homesick.
